name: boatman
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a man whose job is to control a small boat, for example on a river: Boatmen transported goods to market along the river. A boatman will ferry you across for $2.
More examplesFewer examplesYou can hire a boatman to take you in a sort of gondola to the morning market.The canal is already buzzing with activity; boatmen have begun their long day.In mythology, Charon was the boatman of the River Styx.
